import './index.scss'; import AnimatedLetters from "../AnimatedLetters"; import { useState } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faAngular, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate'); return(

An enthusiastic web developer seeking a job position to continue developing skills in the field of web development and to gain experience working in a professional environment.

Possess 5 years of experience in back-end web development, with proficiency in PHP, Magento 2 CMS, and Laravel framework, as well as experience with NodeJS, and ExpressJs framework, MongoDB, Mongoose.

I am eager to learn and apply new skills, take on new challenges, and contribute to the success of the company.

) } export default About;
